sources.title: A Valentine's Date
sources.description: A working mother (Elisa Donovan of CLUELESS) is forced to return to a life she left behind in Texas when her daughter's father (Brad Rowe of TV's GENERAL HOSPITAL) files for joint custody.

metadata.Plot: A working mother (Elisa Donovan of CLUELESS) is forced to return to a life she left behind in Texas when her daughter's father (Brad Rowe of TV's GENERAL HOSPITAL) files for joint custody.
metadata.Writer: Jeffrey Schenck, Peter Sullivan, Michael Feifer
metadata.Actors: Elisa Donovan, Brad Rowe, Tom Skerritt
